eu.europa.ec.eurostat.jgiscotools.graph.algo

Class GraphSimplify

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.europa.ec.eurostat.jgiscotools.graph.algo.GraphSimplify

  • public class GraphSimplify
extends Object
    Some functions to simplify linear meshes. The input is a collection of lines, possibly intersecting, which form a mesh to be simplified.
    Author:
    julien Gaffuri
